backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with comprehensive types for users, memberships, publishing, label releases, recording projects, and artist development, including migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Provides legacy type definitions and a migration runner for upgrading stored canister data between versions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists rollout 21.7 feature evidence, including related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files related to upgrade‑safe rendering and linking functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/ROLL_OUT_21_7_EXECUTION_LOG.md: Records timestamped evidence of rollout 21.7 build, verification steps, and canister upgrade execution.
frontend/ROLL_OUT_21_7_STEP_9_5_ARTIFACT: Stores raw command outputs and build artifacts referenced during rollout 21.7 execution.
frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md: Outlines the full rollout plan with detailed steps for upgrade validation and cross-link QA procedures.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_1_21_2.md: Smoke test checklist for rollout 21.1–21.2 verifying landing page load, authentication, five detail routes, and Edit Links dialogs for admin and member roles.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_3_21_4.md: Smoke test for rollout 21.3–21.4 confirming navigation, detail route stability, and Edit Links dialog behavior for admin and non‑admin users.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_5_21_6.md: Smoke test for rollout 21.5–21.6 ensuring all five detail routes and Edit Links dialogs function correctly for both user roles after upgrade.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7_SESSION_LOG.md: Session log template for recording principals, IDs, console output, and pass/fail results during the 21.7 smoke test.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md: Expanded smoke test for rollout 21.7 emphasizing AuthGate/ApprovalGate behavior, two‑role testing, and detailed entity ID logging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application's route tree, error boundaries, and portal layout with auth gating.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Blocks access until user approval status is confirmed, showing a pending screen and approval request flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Requires Internet Identity authentication, redirecting unauthenticated users and showing sign‑in UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button integrated with Internet Identity and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to complete their profile before entering the portal.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access‑denied message when a user lacks required permissions.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Reusable empty‑state component with optional icon and action callback.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Shows user‑friendly error messages, including mapped backend authorization and not‑found errors.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Full‑screen loading skeleton used while data or auth state is loading.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top navigation header with logo, home navigation, and optional authentication button.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortalLay: Provides the portal layout with a sidebar, mobile menu, and navigation items conditioned on admin status.
frontend/src/components/related/EditLink: Renders a button for opening link-editing actions, with optional disabled state.
frontend/src/components/related/EditRela: Displays a dialog for editing related entity links, handling loading, errors, and multi-select lists.
frontend/src/components/related/MultiSel: Implements a searchable multi-select list with checkboxes and filtering.
frontend/src/components/related/relatedR: Defines permission checks for editing records or memberships based on identity, ownership, and admin status.
frontend/src/components/related/RelatedR: Shows related records with labels resolved based on user role, or a placeholder when none exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's role and approval status using the actor, exposing admin and loading state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and clearing identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkableEntityOpti: Builds linkable entity option lists for admins or regular users by querying various entity types and normalizing results.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, roles, approvals, and memberships.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm neutral palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page presenting marketing content and a sign‑in button that redirects authenticated users to the portal.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminBoo: Admin bootstrap instructions explaining how to initialize the first admin account using a secret token in the URL.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminDas: Admin overview page that loads counts and recent items for all major entity types and displays access-controlled dashboard stats.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/RoleAssi: Admin-only UI for viewing all known users and assigning or changing their roles with immediate updates.
frontend/src/pages/portal/artists/Artist: Displays a single artist development entry with editable linked entities and normalized fields, if permissions allow.
Lists all artist development entries and allows admins to create new ones via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/ReleaseD: Shows detailed release information with editable linked entities and normalized arrays based on user permissions.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/Releases: Lists all label releases, shows loading or empty states, and allows admins to create new releases via a dialog form. Handles form parsing and mutation for creating releases.
frontend/src/pages/portal/memberships/Me: Displays detailed membership info with editable profile fields, related-entity linking, and role-based permissions. Supports updating membership data and managing linked records.
Shows a list of membership profiles with status badges and navigation. Admins can create new membership profiles through a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/publishing/Pub: Shows detailed publishing work info, editable notes, and linked entities with permission checks. Supports saving notes and updating related entity links.
Lists all publishing works and allows admins to create new works with contributor and ownership-split validation. Displays loading and empty states and handles creation via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/recordings/Rec: Displays details for a single recording project, including related entities, editing permissions, and link management via dialogs and mutations.
Lists all recording projects and provides an admin-only dialog to create new projects.
frontend/src/utils/arrays.ts: Provides utility helpers for safely normalizing, validating, and inspecting array-like values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates ownership split arrays ensuring totals are within allowed bounds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom themes, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RE: Manual QA checklist for verifying upgrade-safe linking across portal pages for multiple rollouts.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION.md: Manual QA checklist for verifying post‑upgrade Edit Links functionality across all five detail pages for admin and non‑admin users.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema version, rollout steps, feature history, and known issues for the build process.
